Subject: FSAA Scoping not Working
Description: I am following the scoping for just scanning DFS shares, but all shares are being collected.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c:
1. Drop all FS data for the host (to have a clean slate)
2. Configure All shares excluded and DFS only scoping
3. Run FSAA and Bulk Import
4. View all top level shares not just DFS ones
Solution_Comment__c: After dropping the data about 10x, it finally is scanning and aligning appropriately.
